reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan's style appealing, with one mentioning it looks more put together, and they appreciate its softness.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXACTLY AS PICTURED
items.body: Just recently received this sweater, so I haven't washed it yet, but from 1st impression I'm happy with the look and the quality. Fabric is pretty thick so it should be warm for fall/winter. It was slightly itchy when I tried it on, but not a deal breaker. I'll throw some fabric softner in when I wash it and hopefully that will soften it up a bit. I purchased a sheer long sleeve shirt in the same color cream, so I'll probably throw that on underneath it anyway. Partially because I don't love scratchy sweaters, and partially because I think I'm too old to be showing belly skin! lol. For reference, I'm 5'6" and 170 lbs. Ordered size L, which fits slightly oversized. Read more
items.author: ITSJUSTME

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Itchy but cute
items.body: This is a super cute slouchy fit, thick sweater material. For me the material was too itchy and I returned the item because of it. Color was true to photo. Read more
items.author: G&L

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Unraveled fast
items.body: Cute but strings unraveled after first wear. Thick yarned polyester material does not breathe. Fits loose. Not worth it Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars great quality
items.body: At first I expected it to be like any other cardigan but when it arrived it exceeded my expectations. It is extremely soft and I love the yellow color that I picked. It is a great color addition to my neutral/dark closet for a fall and winter look! i got a size large (L) for an oversized look and it goes great with dark blue jeans and a white t-shirt. It is easy to style and it adds a pop of color in the outfit making it look more put together. I will be purchasing more colors in the future! Read more
items.author: Anna

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft sweater
items.body: Nice and soft but the color seemed more yellow than I thought it would be. Read more
items.author: Kimberly F.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Falls apart after first wash.
items.body: I was so excited for this cardigan because its the same yellow as my brand new business so I thought I would wear it during the cooler months at my pop ups. Except I wash my clothes after every delivery for the first time and even washing this on delicate, it completely fell apart in the wash. All of the loose ends came undone, it snagged in the torso and now I'm out of money and a sweater. Read more
items.author: Elena

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable
items.body: This is actually so adorable. The material is much heavier duty than I expected but overall it’s so cute. Can’t wait to wear this fall Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute design, runs bit and itchy
items.body: I really wanted to like this product but for me it was not a keeper. As pictured, I loved the over sized sweater design that I anticipated with this cardigan, it had a cute tie detail front that added a little something special. However, when received it was a very itchy fabric that you would have to wear a long sleeve with and still would be scratchy around the neck. Also I figured it would be over sized but it was a little to over sized and did not feel as cozy as I wanted, overall just felt baggy. Read more
items.author: Cassie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Pink, Beige, Blue, Yellow, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
